publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4456 Tricia Marwick: Congratulations to McDonald Engineersâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the management and workforce of McDonald Engineers in Glenrothes, which recently extended its premises by 10,000 ft2; recognises that McDonald Engineers was formed 60 years ago and supplies the UK and European market with its copper hot water cylinders, standard cylinders for domestic use and large commercial calorifiers for offices, hospitals, swimming pools and oil rigs and is a recognised specialist in the renewable sector, as a manufacturer of solar powered systems, and in the heat pump and combined heat and power sectors, and considers that this is precisely the kind of company that should be supported and encouraged by Scottish Enterprise and the Scottish Executive.
